samples.instruction: INSPIRE scholarship enna? Science students-ku eppadi apply seivathu?
samples.current_output: Innovation in Science Pursuit for Inspired Research (INSPIRE): DST scheme for science students. 3 components: 1) INSPIRE Award - Class 6-10, â‚¹5,000 one-time 2) SHE (Scholarship for Higher Education) - BSc/BS/Int MSc, â‚¹80,000/year 3) INSPIRE Fellowship - PhD, â‚¹31,000-35,000/month. SHE eligibility: Top 1% in 12th OR KVPY/JEE top 10,000. Apply: www.online-inspire.gov.in.

samples.instruction: Tamil Nadu govt-oda BC/MBC students-ku scholarship enna?
samples.current_output: BC/MBC Welfare Department Scholarships: 1) Post-matric scholarship - â‚¹1,000-3,000/year 2) Professional course scholarship - â‚¹10,000-50,000 3) Foreign study scholarship - up to â‚¹20 lakh 4) Free laptop 5) Free bicycle (school students). Eligibility: BC/MBC community certificate, income â‚¹2.5 lakh/year kizha. Apply: www.bcmbcmw.tn.gov.in. Deadline: Usually September-October.

samples.instruction: Government job-ku endha padippu siranthidhu?
samples.current_output: Padippu wise jobs: 1) Any Degree - TNPSC Group 2/4, SSC CGL, Banking 2) Engineering - PSU, SSC JE, RRB 3) Law - Judicial services 4) Medical - Government hospitals 5) B.Ed - TET, Government teacher. Endha padippum sari, preparation mukkiyam. Age limit kavaniung (32-40 vara depends on category). Current affairs daily padiyunga.

samples.instruction: à®à®©à¯ à®ªà¯ˆà®¯à®©à¯ 10th à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®•à®¿à®±à®¾à®©à¯. Future planning à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®ªà®£à¯à®±à®¤à¯? Wrong decision à®à®Ÿà¯à®•à¯à®• à®•à¯‚à®Ÿà®¾à®¤à¯.
samples.current_output: Balanced approach: 1) Child's interest observe à®ªà®£à¯à®£à¯à®™à¯à®•à®³à¯ - Science/Arts/Sports 2) Aptitude test - free online available 3) Career counselling - school/district level 4) Multiple options explore - don't fix one path early 5) Financial planning start - education costs rising. Avoid: 1) Forcing your dreams on child 2) Neighbour's child comparison 3) One exam = end of world mentality. Support: Encourage exploration, failure tolerance, self-discovery. Best investment = supportive environment. Trust your child!

samples.instruction: Exam-la wrong answer ezhudhitten, cut pannalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Yes, cutting allowed. Method: Single line through wrong text, write correct above/below. Don't: Overwrite, scribble, use whitener (some exams prohibit). For MCQ/OMR: Circle filling rules strict - follow instructions exactly. If OMR mistake: Some allow correction with specific method. Essay type: Neat cutting = no penalty. Messy = bad impression. Time management: Better to continue, cut later if time permits. Rough work: Designated area only.

samples.instruction: Pen students-ku enna special schemes irukku?
samples.current_output:
**Girl Students Special Schemes:**

**1. CM Girl Child Protection:** â‚¹50,000 FD at birth, â‚¹1.5L+ at 18

**2. Free Education:** Up to PG in Govt institutions

**3. Moovalur Ramamirtham:** â‚¹1,000/month for UG girls

**4. Free Bicycle:** Class 11-12 girls

**5. CBSE Udaan:** Free engineering prep for girls

**6. Pragati (AICTE):** â‚¹50,000/year for tech education

**7. Begum Hazrat Mahal:** Minority girls - â‚¹5,000-12,000

**8. Free Bus Travel:** All women free in ordinary buses

**Apply:** tneservices.tn.gov.in or through school/college

samples.instruction: Board exam-la fail aayitten. Life waste aayiduchu endru feel aagudhu. Enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: First: You are NOT a failure! Exam failure â‰  Life failure. Many successful people failed exams: Abdul Kalam, Dhirubhai Ambani. Immediate steps: 1) Supplementary exam-ku prepare - 3 months time 2) Talk to parents/teacher openly 3) If severe stress - school counsellor or helpline iCALL: 9152987821. Future: Many paths to success - ITI, Diploma, NIOS, Skill training. One exam doesn't define you. Rise again stronger!

samples.instruction: Tamil Nadu govt vellinaadu padippuku scholarship tharugiradha?
samples.current_output: Aam, BC/MBC/SC/ST students-ku: 1) BC/MBC Welfare Department - up to â‚¹20 lakh 2) Adi Dravidar Welfare - SC students-ku full scholarship 3) CM's Special Scholarship. Central schemes: 1) National Overseas Scholarship (SC/ST) 2) MOMA Scholarship (Minorities). Apply through respective department websites. Merit-based selection.

samples.instruction: Exam mundhina naal enna seiyanum? Enna seiyakkoodaadhu?
samples.current_output: Do: 1) Light revision - formula sheet, key points only 2) Organize hall ticket, pens, watch 3) Check exam centre route 4) Early dinner, light food 5) Sleep by 10 PM (7-8 hours) 6) Positive thoughts 7) Relaxation - music, walk. Don't: 1) New topics - creates confusion 2) Heavy study - exhaustion 3) Late night - affects performance 4) Junk food, caffeine excess 5) Negative friends/news 6) Panic discussions with peers 7) Social media overthinking. Trust your preparation!

Benefits: Real experience, permanent job chance 70%+. Documents: ITI certificate, Aadhaar, bank account.

samples.instruction: JEE vs TNEA - TN-la Engineering-ku edhu better?
samples.current_output:
**JEE vs TNEA:**

**TNEA:**
- 12th marks based (No exam!)
- TN colleges only
- Score = MathsÃ—50 + PhyÃ—25 + ChemÃ—25 = 200
- tneaonline.org

**JEE:**
- Exam based
- All India (IIT, NIT, IIIT)
- Tough competition

**Choose TNEA if:**
- Want TN college
- Limited coaching
- Strong in boards

**Choose JEE if:**
- Target IIT/NIT
- Can do coaching
- Want All India options

**Best:** Prepare JEE + Apply both!

samples.instruction: Government job salary ranges
samples.current_output: TNPSC Group 1: â‚¹56,100-1,77,500 (DSP, DC level). Group 2: â‚¹35,400-1,12,400 (Assistant level). Group 4: â‚¹19,500-62,000 (Clerk level). Banking PO: â‚¹40,000-80,000+. SSC CGL: â‚¹35,000-1,50,000. Teaching (TRB): â‚¹35,000-70,000. Note: Includes DA, HRA, benefits.

samples.instruction: Juvenile home-la irundhen. Ippo padikka chance irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Yes, absolutely! Rehabilitation includes education: 1) Continuation of education during detention 2) NIOS for school completion 3) Skill training provided 4) After release: Regular school/college admission possible 5) No mandatory disclosure of juvenile record. Support: Juvenile Justice Board, NGOs, Social Welfare Department. Records sealed - fresh start possible. Many have rebuilt lives through education. You deserve a second chance!

samples.instruction: Hall ticket missing, exam-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®ªà¯‹à®• à®®à¯à®Ÿà®¿à®¯à¯à®®à®¾?
samples.current_output: Emergency solutions: 1) Download duplicate from exam portal (DigiLocker link) 2) Contact exam centre - they have candidate list 3) Carry Aadhaar + Photo ID as backup 4) School/College principal letter 5) Reach early, explain to centre supervisor. For board exams: School coordinator can help. For competitive exams: Most allow with ID proof + declaration. Prevention: Download multiple copies, keep in phone, email to self. Last resort: Exam board helpline.

samples.instruction: HDFC Bank Parivartan's ECSS scholarship à®à®©à¯à®©?
samples.current_output: Educational Crisis Scholarship Support (ECSS): Financial crisis-à®²à¯ à®‰à®³à¯à®³ students-à®•à¯à®•à¯. Amount: Up to â‚¹75,000. Eligibility: Family crisis (death, illness, job loss), income â‚¹6 lakh à®•à¯€à®´à¯, 55%+ marks. Covers: School/College fee. Apply: www.hdfcbankecss.com. Documents: Crisis proof, income proof, marks, Aadhaar. One-time emergency support.

samples.instruction: Government hostel-la seat eppadi kidaikkum?
samples.current_output: Process: 1) Apply through college/department 2) Priority: Distance from home, family income, caste category 3) Documents: Income certificate, nativity, distance proof 4) BC/MBC/SC/ST welfare hostels - apply through respective departments 5) Working women's hostel - separate application. Fees: Government hostel very subsidized (â‚¹100-500/month). Free for eligible SC/ST. Apply early - seats limited. Waiting list exists.

samples.instruction: TNPSC Group 4 Exam-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**TNPSC Group 4 Preparation:**

**Eligibility:** 10th pass, Age 18-32

**Exam Pattern:**
- GK: 50 questions - 150 marks
- Tamil: 50 questions - 150 marks
- Total: 300 marks, 3 hours
- Negative: 1/3 mark

**GK Syllabus:**
History, Geography, Polity, Economy, Science, Current Affairs

**Tamil Syllabus:**
Grammar, Literature, General Tamil, Translation

**Books:**
- Tamil: 6th-12th TN Books, Pothu Tamil guides
- GK: NCERT + TN Textbooks
- Current: Tamil Hindu daily

**6-Month Plan:**
- Month 1-2: Textbook basics
- Month 3-4: Deep study
- Month 5: Revision
- Month 6: Mock tests

**Tips:**
1. Tamil medium advantage
2. 10th books = 60% syllabus
3. Previous 10 years papers must

samples.instruction: ITI join aaga enna pannanum-pa? Free-vaa irukkuma?
samples.current_output: 10th/8th pass pannirukkanum. www.skilltraining.tn.gov.in-la apply pannu/pannunga. Government ITI full free - fee illai, tools, books ellam free. Documents: TC, marks card, community certificate, Aadhaar. June-July-la admission start aagum.

samples.instruction: JEE Main & Advanced-ku eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**JEE Preparation:**

**Class 11:** Foundation - NCERT mastery, Concepts clear

**Class 12:** Intensive - Complete by Dec, Mock tests from March

**Books:**
- Maths: NCERT â†’ RD Sharma â†’ Cengage
- Physics: NCERT â†’ HC Verma â†’ DC Pandey
- Chemistry: NCERT (Must!) â†’ MS Chouhan â†’ OP Tandon

**Daily Routine:**
- 5:30 AM: Maths (Best time)
- Afternoon: Physics
- Evening: Chemistry + Revision

**Weekly:**
- Sunday: Full mock test
- Mistake analysis
- Weak topic revision

**JEE Advanced:** After Main, 2-month intensive, Complex problems

samples.instruction: Fine Arts padichaa future enna?
samples.current_output: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts): 4 years. Specializations: Painting, Sculpture, Applied Art, Graphic Design. Colleges: Govt College of Fine Arts Chennai, Kumbakonam. Jobs: Art galleries, Advertising agencies, Film industry (Art director), Teaching, Freelance artist. Digital art growing field. Salary varies widely: â‚¹15,000-1 lakh+ based on skill and reputation. Portfolio and networking crucial.

samples.instruction: IBPS PO/Clerk Exam Pattern à®à®©à¯à®©? à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ prepare à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output:
**IBPS PO/Clerk Exam Pattern:**

**IBPS PO:**

**Prelims (1 hour):**
| Section | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| English | 30 | 30 |
| Quantitative | 35 | 35 |
| Reasoning | 35 | 35 |
| **Total** | **100** | **100** |

**Mains (3 hours):**
| Section | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| Reasoning + Computer | 45 | 60 |
| English | 35 | 40 |
| Data Analysis | 35 | 60 |
| General/Banking Awareness | 40 | 40 |
| **Total** | **155** | **200** |

**Interview:** 100 marks

**IBPS Clerk:**

**Prelims:** Same as PO (100 marks, 1 hour)

**Mains (2 hrs 40 min):**
| Section | Questions | Marks |
|---------|-----------|-------|
| General English | 40 | 40 |
| Reasoning + Computer | 50 | 60 |
| Quantitative | 50 | 50 |
| GK/Banking | 50 | 50 |
| **Total** | **190** | **200** |

**No Interview for Clerk!**

**Preparation Books:**

| Subject | Book |
|---------|------|
| Quantitative | RS Aggarwal, Arun Sharma |
| Reasoning | RS Aggarwal, MK Pandey |
| English | Wren & Martin, SP Bakshi |
| Banking | Arihant Banking Awareness |
| GK | Lucent GK, Pratiyogita Darpan |

**Preparation Strategy:**

**Month 1-2:**
- Basics of Quant, Reasoning
- English grammar
- Daily current affairs

**Month 3-4:**
- Advanced topics
- Speed building
- Banking knowledge

**Month 5-6:**
- Mock tests daily
- Previous papers
- Time management

**Daily Routine:**
- 2 hours Quant
- 2 hours Reasoning
- 1 hour English
- 1 hour GK/Current Affairs
- 1 hour Mock test analysis

samples.instruction: Myth or Fact: Myth: SC/ST reservation = undeserving students getting seats
samples.current_output: Fact: Fact: Reservation = Equalizing historical disadvantage. SC/ST students also clear cutoffs, just in their category. Many top performers are from reserved categories. Reservation doesn't mean zero merit - minimum marks required. Social mobility happening due to reservation - breaking caste barriers in education. Focus on your preparation, not others' category.
